properties.name: Urras: Major lakes
properties.note: Major lakes of the planet Urras, as realised in 'The Dispossessed' and 'The Day Before the Revolution' by Ursula K. Le Guin. There are five lakes of note. For more information, see indvidual features and 'tauceti_notes.pdf'. Names are given where known from source material. Names given here are for ease of reference only, since no landmass is given a name in the source material.
properties.reference: References to source material is given for each feature. 'The Dispossessed' is referenced as TD:<chapters>. 'The Day Before the Revolution' is referenced as TDBTR.
properties.license: CC:By-NC-SA (see: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/). Cartography by Ida-Sofia Skyman based on original maps and work by Ursula K. Le Guin.

properties.name: Thu Lake
properties.note: A lake in northern Thu on the Eastern Continent. The second largest lake in the eastern hemisphere.

properties.name: Middle Lake
properties.note: A lake just east of Thu Lake and just west of East Lake in the northern part of the Eastern Continent. The largest lake in the eastern hemisphere.

properties.name: East Lake
properties.note: A lake just east of Middle Lake in the northern part of the Eastern Continent. The third largest lake in the eastern hemisphere.

properties.name: Benbili Lake
properties.note: A lake in the southern part of the Western Continent. It is partly in Benbili and partly in an unknown nation. The second largest lake in the eastern hemisphere. The Benbili River, which runs its course through much of the Western Continent on its way to the North Sea, starts here.

properties.name: Arctic Lake
properties.note: A lake in the far northern part of the Western Continent. It is entirely within an unknown nation. The largest lake in the eastern hemisphere. Its proximity to the arctic ice deserts suggest that it may remain at least partly frozen all year round.
